price: (Nkͻmhyεni), si aboterε wͻ deε wͻrekeka no ho, na kae Y’akoa Dawud a na ͻwͻ tumi no. Nokorε sε ͻdanee ne ho (nyinaa) de maa (Me).
arabic: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذۡكُرۡ عَبۡدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلۡأَيۡدِۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-udh'kur ʿabdanā dāwūda dhā al-aydi innahu awwābun
